metadata.title: Neural Interface Protocol Documentation
metadata.author: Dr. Sarah Chen - Cybernetics Division
metadata.credits: Special thanks to the Neural Systems Development Team for their contributions to the cyberpunk interface specifications.

content.content: for cyberpunk systems integration. The protocol enables seamless communication between human neural patterns and digital matrices.
The neural interface consists of three primary components:

1. Neural Pattern Recognition Engine
2. Digital Matrix Translation Layer
3. Cyberpunk Security Protocol Handler
"The future of human-computer interaction lies not in external interfaces, but in direct neural integration."
- Dr. William Gibson, Neural Systems Research Institute
When implementing neural interfaces, developers must consider the following
protocols and ensure compatibility with existing cyberpunk infrastructure.

body.content:
// Neural Interface Initialization
class NeuralInterface {
  constructor() {
    this.matrix = new DigitalMatrix();
    this.security = new CyberpunkProtocol();
  }
  
  connect(neuralPattern) {
    return this.matrix.integrate(neuralPattern);
  }
}

content.content: All neural interface connections must be encrypted using quantum-resistant algorithms to prevent corporate espionage and neural hijacking attempts.
